author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Vietnam named as one of world's 10 must-see destinations in autumnTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Vietnam named as one of world’s 10 must-see destinations in autumn
Vietnam has been picked up as one of the world’s 10 must-see destinations in autumn by the global Fodor’s Travel magazine.
According to Fordor’s, autumn is an ideal time to travel, admire beautiful landscapes and experience different cultures, reports Vietnam News Agency (VNA).
It’s been forty years since the end of the Vietnam War, and there’s never been a better time to visit this rapidly developing nation, it said adding, ‘from the countryside of Vietnam to the beaches of the Florida Panhandle, these are Fodor’s top ten places to go this fall’.
The magazine mentioned that the weather at this time of the year is generally pleasant throughout the north and south. So, if travelers are looking for an exotic escape, September, October and November are some of the slowest months, it said.
The magazine recommended that vacationers definitely should not miss Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh City and picturesque Ha Long Bay.
